reviews.review_msg: Very passionate intense young man - shows in lectures. Has extremely high expectations (esp. for written work)! But he's a REALLY NICE guy, kind, & approachable! Addresses any questions you may have & will help you with the material. WORK HARD & you'll survive. Ah, DEATH march, hike & run -oh pain. Funny guy. Loves piwo. Great trip! SUPER EXTRA!!!
